snippet.title: The LEGO® Movie 2 Videogame Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment, TT Games and The LEGO Group today announced the launch of The LEGO® Movie 2 Videogame, inspired by the new big-screen animated adventure, The LEGO® Movie 2: The Second Part from Warner Bros. Pictures now in theatres. The LEGO® Movie 2 Videogame will be available in the UK this Friday 1st March for Nintendo Switch™ system, PlayStation® 4 computer entertainment system and the Xbox One family of devices, including Xbox One X with a RRP of £34.99 and digitally on PC with a RRP of £24.99. The physical version for Nintendo Switch™ will be available on 15th March 2019.
